subdivision_of_building: Ground floor conservatory and quiet room to the rear and soft play area to the front.
site_number: St Mary and Pope Kyrillos VI Coptic Orthodox Church
description: Part change of use of existing church to day nursery / creche.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith [02, 03, 04, Nursery Specification, Planning Statement, 01-Site Survey as Existing received 20 August 2021; Supporting Statement received 21 October 2021; Noise Impact Assessment and Management received 23 December 2021;Transport Statement, Draft Travel Plan received 7 February 2022] and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for a nursery (Class E(f)) and a place of worship (F1(f)) and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class E and F1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted for nursery (Class E(f)) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times 07:30 ? 18:30.
Condition : 5 - The use hereby permitted for nursery (Class E(f)) purposes shall not accommodate more than 30 children on site at any one time.

Condition : 6 - No part of the development shall be occupied until a car parking management plan has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The measures as approved shall be implemented before the first occupation of the development hereby permitted and shall be maintained for the duration of the use unless the prior written approval of the local planning authority is obtained to any variation.

Condition : 7 - No part of the development shall be occupied until full details of electric vehicle parking provision (7.2kW output) for no less than one car parking space has been provided in accordance with details that have first been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved facilities shall conform with requirements stipulated within the London Plan and be made available for use before the first occupation of the development and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.

Condition : 8 - No part of the development shall be occupied until full details of the disabled parking provision have been provided accordance with details that have first been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. A minimum of one space should be designated for
disabled parking a further one space should be enlarged The approved facilities shall conform with requirements stipulated within the London Plan and be made available for use before the first occupation of the development and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.

Condition : 9 - Before the development hereby permitted is first occupied or brought into use, a finalised Travel Plan in accordance with current Council and TfL guidance comprising immediate, continuing and long-term measures to promote and encourage a reduction in car and a commitment that all staff should park on site shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved Travel Plan shall be implemented upon occupation, and thereafter monitored and reviewed in accordance with the agreed Travel Plan targets and timescales to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 10 - Before the development hereby approved is first occupied, the developer shall provide secure covered cycle parking for no less than five bicycles. The approved facilities shall conform the Transport for London ?London Cycling Design Standards? in design and layout.

Condition : 11 - No deliveries or collections (including refuse) shall be carried out at the approved premises except between the hours of 7:00am and 10:00pm from Monday to Saturday, and 9:00am and 1:00pm on Sundays.

Condition : 12 - No live and/or amplified music or any other live and/or amplified noise shall be played in the external areas of the premises without the prior consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 13 - The development shall be implemented in accordance with the Noise Impact Assessment and Management (21st December 2021) and the adopted management / mitigation measures retained for the lifetime of the development.
